# Radio

Radio button with a label.

## Usage Example

```JSX
<Radio name="groupName" id="uniqueId" label="Radio Button" />
```

---

## Props:

* [name](#name)
* [id](#id)
* [label](#label)

### name

| Required? | Type | Default | Options |
|:---:|:---:|---|---|
| yes | string | | |

Radio button name

### id

| Required? | Type | Default | Options |
|:---:|:---:|---|---|
| yes | string | | |


Radio button id

### label

| Required? | Type | Default | Options |
|:---:|:---:|---|---|
| yes | string | | |


Radio button label
